DOC.detailed_description: Methods : Experimental design : longitudinal study prospective single center . The Ankylosing Spondylitis Assesment Study ( ASAS ) criterion : ( 1 ) age < 45 year , back pain ≥ 3 month , sacroiliitis image ≥ 1 associate minor criterion , ( 2 ) HLA B27 positive ≥ 2 minor criterion . Minor criterion : inflammatory back pain , arthritis , enthesitis , uveitis , Dactylitis , psoriasis , Crohn 's disease , good clinical response NSAIDs , family history Human Leukocyte Antigen HLA B27 inflammatory syndrome . Plan Investigation : Patients study see first consultation gather necessary information : history taking ( include venous arterial embolic event obstetric history ) , usual treatment , ASAS criterion therapeutic AS , current previous , comprehensive physical examination . APLA measure baseline least 3 month initially positive . OUTCOME : The primary endpoint presence absence APLA : anti-cardiolipin antibody ( CLA ) immunoglobulin M ( IgM ) immunoglobulin G ( IgG ) , circulate anticoagulant lupus ( CCA ) , anti-beta2 glycoprotéine1 antibody ( β2GP1A ) IgM IgG . The secondary endpoint : - The presence thrombosis ( past present ) obstetrical accident ( anterior ) - Relationship presence APLA particular form AS ( axial peripheral ) - Relationship presence APLA anti-TNF alpha therapy Calendar : The expect study duration 16 month . Statistical Analysis Plan A descriptive analysis perform . The variable describe number percentage ; quantitative variable describe mean standard deviation . A calculation prevalence APLA make . Univariate analysis perform secondary objective Chi 2 test Fisher exact test accord application condition .
